hitop

The goal of hitop is to provide functions helpful for researchers working on the Hierarchical Taxonomy of Psychopathology (HiTOP). For now, this includes functions for scoring the PID-5 and HiTOP-PRO. However, more features will be added soon.

Installation

You can install the development version of hitop from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jmgirard/hitop")
